reviewText: As it turns out, the title of the book is a bit misleading. The C model installation and/or removal of the right side cartridge stop is completely ignored. The left side cartridge stop is covered in detail, but it's a completely different critter than the stop used on the right side. Also, the DVD picture quality is not good, especially on a large display. The DVD is a poor quality copy from a VHS tape that needed better production techniques from back when it was produced. Having said that, most owners will find several hints and secrets in this production that are quite valuable. Since this DVD has no competition in the subject of 1897 Winchester shotguns, it's this one or do without.
